name: Ecto in the House of Plasm
name_original: Ecto in the House of Plasm
description:
Lighthearted exploration, platforming, and mild puzzle solving created as a personal programming challenge for the month of October. Though the goal was to produce a demo within the month, I have cut lots of content for the deadline. I will try to get that content into a more complete demo shortly.

Some supported for PS4 controller, though not 100%.

Menus were last minute, will be improved shortly.
